code: import _toConsumableArray from"/home/zeeshan/Projects/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={cartItems:[]};var cartSlice=createSlice({name:'cart',initialState:initialState,reducers:{addItemsToCart:function addItemsToCart(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;var existingItemIndex=state.cartItems.findIndex(function(cartItem){return cartItem.title===payload.title;});if(existingItemIndex!==-1){var prevQuantity=state.cartItems[existingItemIndex].quantity;var newQuantity=prevQuantity+1;state.cartItems[existingItemIndex].quantity=newQuantity;}else{state.cartItems.push(payload);}},reduceItemQuantity:function reduceItemQuantity(state,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;var existingItemIndex=state.cartItems.findIndex(function(cartItem){return cartItem.title===payload.title;});if(existingItemIndex!==-1){var prevQuantity=state.cartItems[existingItemIndex].quantity;var newQuantity=prevQuantity-1;state.cartItems[existingItemIndex].quantity=newQuantity;}},removeItem:function removeItem(state,_ref3){var payload=_ref3.payload;if(state.cartItems.length<=1){state.cartItems=[];}var newArr=state.cartItems.filter(function(cartItem){return cartItem.title!==payload.title;});state.cartItems=_toConsumableArray(newArr);}}});var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,addItemsToCart=_cartSlice$actions.addItemsToCart,reduceItemQuantity=_cartSlice$actions.reduceItemQuantity,removeItem=_cartSlice$actions.removeItem;export{addItemsToCart,reduceItemQuantity,removeItem};export var selectCartItems=function selectCartItems(state){return state.cart.cartItems;};export default cartSlice.reducer;
